articles.title: Turbulence: Twelve injured on Doha-Dublin flight - BBC.com
articles.description: Dublin Airport says the Boeing 787-9 dreamliner experienced turbulence while airborne over Turkey.
articles.content:
Twelve people have been injured due to turbulence on a flight from Doha to Dublin.
The Boeing 787-9 dreamliner experienced turbulence while airborne over Turkey, Dublin Airport's operator DAA said.… [+3148 chars]

articles.author: Jamie Carter
articles.title: Saw The Eclipse And Aurora? Now Comes A Third Once-In-A-Lifetime Event - Forbes
articles.description: Comet Tsuchinshan-ATLAS (C/2023 A3) is expected to become a naked-eye comet in October 2024. It is currently observable with a large telescope.
articles.content:
Comet 12P/Pons-Brooks, also called the "Devil Comet," was at its brightest in April 2024.
